outlined.description: Outlined icons customize stroke and fill attributes for a light, clean style that works well in dense UIs. The stroke weight of outlined icons can be adjusted to complement or contrast the weight of your typography.

round.description: Rounded icons use a corner radius that pairs well with brands that use heavier typography, curved logos, or circular elements to express their style.

two-tone.description: Two-tone icons have added dimension, using the attributes of stroke, fill, and color. Contrasting stroke and fill colors enables the use of multiple brand colors and can improve legibility.

sharp.description: Sharp icons display corners with straight edges, for a crisp style that remains legible even at smaller scales. These rectangular shapes can support brand styles that arenâ€™t well-reflected by rounded shapes.

dark.description: An icon on a light background with a dark foreground color.

light.description: An icon on a dark background with a light foreground color.

inactive.description: An icon is disabled or inactive.
